name: Deceit - Werewolf Pack
detailed_description:
With the Werewolf Expansion, you will be able to strike terror into the innocents’ hearts as you howl and transform into the Werewolf Terror form! The Werewolf is a new playable terror offering a substantially different play style; it’s a fast and fragile assassin with a short duration active ability meaning engagements with innocents must be well timed and carefully considered.

It’s active is the Outcry, when used the Werewolf unleashes and blood curdling howl that causes all human characters within its radius to become confused for a few seconds. Whilst confused, their vision is blurred and the screen shakes making responding to incoming threats more difficult.

Additionally, Innocents gain access to an exclusive new machete melee weapon to defend themselves and get to show their love for classic B movie styling with two more exclusive items, the Beware the Terror T-shirt and Wolf emblem.

On top of that the pack includes 10 loot booth tokens to help you get even more cosmetic gear for your character and 200 GM tokens to put towards your next item or use with the new Reputation system to show appreciation to your favourite fellow players.

This pack contains:
  • Playable Werewolf Terror
  • Exclusive: Machete Melee Weapon
  • Exclusive: Bewere the Terror T Shirt
  • Exclusive: Wolf Emblem
  • 10 Loot Booth Tokens
  • 200 GM Credits
